content: 23/May/2016 - Reminder that we have FGB call today at 4pm ET/US. No agenda yet posted to wiki. I can chair the call.
23/May/2016 - Agenda is posted for today's call (Thanks Anne!) http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=20150523_FGB_concall
30/May/2016 - I'm in the middle of a house move so unable to attend/chair the May 30th call. Is there someone else who can chair?
I am away all next week
I am away next week and will not make most HL7 calls
Grr... I just had a day job call clobber the FGB timeslot for today. I will try to make it if my call ends early
13/June/2016 - Call today in about an hour. Lorraine provided regrets earlier today. http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=20160613_FGB_concall
13/June/2016 - Unclear if @Anne Wizauer will be joining; no joy so far. I'm on the goto meeting webinar and the goto meeting audio call. No joy yet.
13/June/2016 And nobody on the old HL7.org conference call number, either. I shall wait.
I've just joined... nobody here....

13/June/2016 - I think we are screwed on the meeting without @Anne Wizauer starting the webinar. That or we drop back to the hold hl7.org dial-in number and hold the call w/o web session (which we likely don't need anyway)
I can start the webinar
dial-in then. Lloyd and I are here
We don't use the GMT audio - or at least haven't been.
Standby
NEW PLAN -- all join the HL7.org call -- 770-657-9270 using code 985371#
discussion topic for next week I thought of too late for this call: from a technical view point, we are now able to publish Implementation guides separately from the FHIR specification

we have agree that some of the existing IGs are 'core' - and will remain part of the standard - locked into being edited as part of the spec. but most of the rest will be disconnected from the specification, and have their own life cycle.

there's 2 questions that arise, then:
- which ones remain core, and which ones are ejected
- for the ones that are ejected, at least some still need to be published under hl7.org/fhir. And there's going to be real benefits for that
do we think that there's governance aspects to the first question?
and I think we need to discuss the governance aspects of the second on next week's phone call
18/Jul/2016 - No agenda yet posted; are we having a call today?

I did post an agenda but it's not showing up...let me check
Also, Lloyd would like to cancel today to run FHIR-I for two hours and wants to know if there's anything pressing
I do not have any pressing issues so I'm OK with canceling today (18/JUL/2016)
I fixed it...I had a wrong number in the link. Anyway, it was just a carryover from the last call we cancelled and it sounds as though we are cancelling today as well.
I hear no screaming -- 18/JUL/2016 hereby CANCELED.
We may want to soft cancel until after ballot goes out - difficult to think of governance issues when large parts of the team are flat out getting content out.
are we planning to meet today, or is everyone still buried after yesterday's freeze?
2016-JUL-25 - agenda posted for today -- per @Lorraine Constable I'm also willing to cancel today if nothing urgent or folks buried -- http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=20160725_FGB_concall
Calvin just emailed that he's unable to attend today.
We probably don't need to run FHIR-I for 2 hours today, so we *could* meet. I don't have anything urgent.
I'm available, but I don't see anything urgent on the agenda, and I suspect Grahame can use a break. So cancelling is fine with me as well.
lets cancel - I am buried in day job issues, and I suspect a break for Grahame is the best course
Let's make it official -- 25/JUL/2016 FGB call is CANCELED.
I am heading out for vacation starting Jul 29. talk to you mid-August

1-August-2016 -- Regarding today's call. Lorraine is out. We don't have a scribe we can fake that as needed. No major items on agenda. Thoughts? http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=20160801_FGB_concall
1/AUG/2016 - Wayne and Lloyd are OK with canceling today's call.
1/AUG/2016 - Proposing that we cancel for today. Agenda for next week to include discussion -- policy around how we allow the github projects to be set up - who controls committer access, etc.
1/AUG/2016 - Officially canceling call for August 1, 2016. Added git hub topic to next week's call -- http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=20160808_FGB_concall#Agenda

08/AUG/2016 - The FHIR Governance Board (FGB) has a call schedule for today (8/8/2016) at 4pm ET/US. As discussed via chat.fhir.org last week, we have one main topic to discuss:

• Policy on hosting implementation guides on github
• Policy around how we allow the github projects to be set up
• Who controls committer access, etc.

We proposed that “someone in the know” would write up a few paragraphs to help guide discussion. Anyone open to doing so in the next few hours?

http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=20160808_FGB_concall
Do we have a call today?
I assumed so...It's Lorraine and me so far
Around if needed!
y please
brt
first participant?
What's the meeting id?
https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/136494157
GTM Audio I guess
Do we meet in 15 mins?

I believe we are meeting.
http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=20150822_FGB_concall
I am the only one on the call?
we're using the gotomeeting audio
2016-08-29 We have a FGB call today at 4pm ET/US. I have posted proposed agenda -- http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=20160829_FGB_concall
I have a client meeting conflicting with Monday's call, if we are meeting. Dave, can you chair?
2016-Oct-03 We have a call scheduled at 4pm ET today -- agenda: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=20161003_FGB_concall
I will miss today's call -- have to attend Argonaut call instead.
I guess I'll be doing the same
2016-10-10 -- we have a call scheduled in about 15 mins -- http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=20161010_FGB_concall
2016-10-10 call canceled; L and L out due to Thanksgiving; G was on plane; no urgent agenda items. Talk to you next week!

All, I have a new client and the biweekly status meetings overlap with the first half hour of our call. In the second half hour of next week can we discuss whether to leave the call time as is, and I will be late every other week, or to adjust the call time? Thanks
Seems Dave is also away, and Wayne will be in the air, so we are canceling for today
How badly do we need FGB today? (FHIR-I would gladly use the additional hour to work on ballot reconciliation)
I've got regrets from Calvin
Decision made to cancel by Dave
Regarding today's (2016-10-24) call: Anne and I are on the call solo so far; sorry I did not see earlier note re: cancellation. Lorraine is out first half of meeting; I propose we CANCEL FOR TODAY.
Grahame indicated to me that he *won't* be on today's call.
